text: It's no secret that the past few Keeping Up With The Kardashains episode has seen tensions rise between sisters Kourtney, Kim and Khloe. And the family feud continued on Sunday night's episode when the Kardashian - Jenner brood all got together to decide who would and wouldn't make the invite list for their annual Christmas Eve party. Sitting around the kitchen table together, momager Kris, Kim and Khloe all ganged up on Kourtney when they slammed her for not wanting to invite her ex - boyfriend Scott, and then Kendall when they refused to invite her dad Caitlyn Jenner. Bad blood? Kendall Jenner was left livid on Sunday night's episode of Keeping Up With The Kardashians when her mom Kris refused to invite her
